means: 责问演说者，对…起哄( heckle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The ceremony was disrupted by unprecedented heckling and slogan-chanting.
sentence.Network_cn: 仪式因前所未有的起哄和喊口号声而中断。

sentence.Network_en: The reporter was hostile to the government official in heckling him.
sentence.Network_cn: 记者含着敌意向政府官员激烈质询.

sentence.Network_en: To make taunting , heckling, or jeering remarks.
sentence.Network_cn: 诘问者的嘲笑打断了她的讲话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: heckling 梳理, heckling 针排, heckling 追问

list.abs: The reporter want to heckle the candidate with those embarrassing question ., 记者想用那些让人难为情的问题来刁难这位候选人.
heckle的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... n.针排麻>> heckle 质问(袭扰,梳理) heckle 质问,袭扰,梳理 heckle.
bob dylan was heckled while performing in england bob dylan ., 在英国演出时遭到指责.
heckling machine分享到:  【纺织;造纸】栉梳机【纺织;造纸】麻梳机器分类:通用词汇相关的句子:查看句子 | 查看相关文献(pubmed) | 免费全文文献.

entry.def: If people in an audience heckle public speakers or performers, they interrupt them, for example by making rude remarks.

example.ex: They heckled him and interrupted his address with angry questions...
example.tran: 他们冲他起哄，以激愤的问题打断他的发言。

example.ex: He was insulted and heckled mercilessly...
example.tran: 他遭到无情的羞辱和诘问。

means.word_mean: 1. shouting to interrupt a speech with which you disagree

auth_sentence.content: I know the President has fun heckling Congress.
auth_sentence.res_content: I know the President has fun heckling Congress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I know the President has fun heckling Congress.

auth_sentence.content: Toward the end of the book, a policeman clubs Lindau for heckling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Toward the end of the book, a policeman clubs Lindau for heckling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Toward the end of the book, a policeman clubs Lindau for heckling.

auth_sentence.content: It seems that Lewis's response to this heckling was, erm, somewhat heated.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems that Lewis's response to this heckling was, erm, somewhat heated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems that Lewis's response to this heckling was, erm, somewhat heated.
